long_description: The easy-riding Scott Sportster 50 bike offers a comfortable upright riding position and speedy, smooth-rolling wheels for mellow commutes, riding about town or exploring your local bike path. Aluminum frame is light and sturdy enough to tackle rough urban streets. Flat handlebar creates a comfortable, upright riding position that enables heads-up visibility. SR Suntour NEX suspension fork provides 63mm of travel to soften out bumps and jolts. Shimano triple crankset powers 24 gear choices to ably handle almost any grade; Shimano trigger shifters deftly guide the derailleurs through each gear. Shimano mechanical disc brakes deliver controlled deceleration and stops, even in wet weather. Large 700c wheels with plush, semislick tires cruise along easily for a swift, sporty ride. Frame eyelets accept fenders or a rear rack (not included); replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend usable life of the frame. The Scott Sportster 50 bike specs are subject to change.
